sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of DowDuPont ( DWDP ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, DowDuPont has lost about 5.4% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.8%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 1.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Travelers Companies ( TRV ), trading down 0.7%, and Walgreens Boots Alliance ( WBA ), trading up 1.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
